item.title: A Day in My Life: Somaliland Edition
item.description: The other day, my dad asked me to write a short piece about what my daily life is like in Somaliland. I usually refrain from such things, but I think it is a good opportunity to show how normal everything is here. With a few caveats. [![Office Guest Suite][2]][2] I generally awake between 9 and 10. Although this is late for a work day, if you read to the end youâ€™ll see why.
